text:
Currently, Apache web server 2 is using a file to store configuration information. Users have to open that file by text editor and change the configuration details to make it fit their purpose.

There are some disadvantages of this configure method as:
-	The configuration is hard to be used all users even for experienced users.
-	If user changes something by mistake, it’s hard to identify where the error is and rollback.

Using a GUI for configuration eases configuring process. Furthermore, some useful functionality can be embedded into that graphical configuration utility such as back up, restore configuration.
